articles.title: Coronavirus: A shocking new discovery may explain why Europe's death toll is so high - Express
articles.description: CORONAVIRUS has ravaged Europe and now the UK is expected to become the worst hit country. A new study proposes one scientific explanation for the assault on the continent.
